Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-53605 affecting package kata-containers for versions less than 3.19.1.kata2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-53605 affecting package kata-containers for versions less than 3.19.1.kata2-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package kata-containers is earlier than 3.19.1.kata2-1, affected by CVE-2025-53605
